message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you our latest product. While we can't disclose its exact quality due to privacy policies, I can assure you that our products are carefully selected with customer satisfaction in mind. Given our track record, you might expect a high-quality item, though there's always a chance of receiving a low-quality one. Considering the final price of $10000, would you like to take a chance on this mystery product?
I'd like to buy the product. I'm willing to take the risk, and I'm hoping for a high-quality item.

Hello and welcome! I'm delighted to present our current product, which boasts a high-quality standard. With a success rate of 50% for high-quality items, this could be an excellent opportunity for you. Given the final price of $10000, are you ready to invest in a product that promises exceptional value and satisfaction?
I'd like to pass on this opportunity. I'd like to know the overall proportion of high-quality products sold so far, and also the number of products offered to previous buyers.

Considering the current product is high-quality, it aligns well with our historical data. I'm not convinced that the product is high-quality just because it aligns with historical data. I'd like to know the proportion of high-quality products sold so far, and I'm not willing to buy without more information.
